entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
